name: Google Chrome Universal UI Kit
description:
This is a Google Chrome UI Kit made entirely in Figma, currently contains versions of the UI for Android, WIndows and MacOS.

  • made with variants (change the platform and colour scheme in just one click!)
  • made with auto layout
  • consistent spacing system
  • precise colours used in the actual Chrome UI and Material UI

Enjoy!


Update: Since I'm not an iOS user and have never used Chrome on an Apple device, I've decided to not make an iOS adaptation until I've gathered enough info, which could take a while. For now, check out other UI Kits like these two:

  • https://www.figma.com/community/file/838445420873935091
  • https://www.figma.com/community/file/887103964109234047
